biotools.summary: PEPPER is a genome inference module based on recurrent neural networks that enables long-read variant calling and nanopore assembly polishing in the PEPPER-Margin-DeepVariant pipeline. This pipeline enables nanopore-based variant calling with DeepVariant.

bioschemas.name: P.E.P.P.E.R. and DeepVariant
bioschemas.summary: PEPPER is a genome inference module based on recurrent neural networks that enables long-read variant calling and nanopore assembly polishing in the PEPPER-Margin-DeepVariant pipeline. This pipeline enables nanopore-based variant calling with DeepVariant.
